channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kirk assassination unleashes global groundswell of support, Erika Kirk vows to carry on legacy
item.description: The breadth and depth of support for Charlie Kirk was on full display over the weekend as political leaders, activists and mourners around the globe a...

item.title: New York Gov. Kathy Hochul endorses Zohran Mamdani for NYC mayor
item.description: Gov. Kathy Hochul on Sunday urged New Yorkers to vote Zohran Mamdani for mayor of New York City, giving the Democratic nominee one of his most signifi...

item.title: Trump officials, GOP lawmakers recall personal moments with Charlie Kirk at D.C. vigil
item.description: Republican lawmakers, conservative leaders and Trump administration officials shared personal stories at a memorial service and prayer vigil Sunday ni...

item.title: Trump threatens emergency in D.C. over lack of immigration enforcement
item.description: President Trump on Monday warned of declaring another federal emergency in the District of Columbia due to the city's lack of immigration enforcement.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Bondi, DOJ overhaul immigration rulings to clamp down on bogus asylum claims
item.description: The Trump administration has quietly rewritten the rule book this month for illegal immigrants seeking asylum in the U.S., making it tougher to win th...

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Wu Woos Illegal Aliens in Boston
item.description: For Boston Mayor Michelle Wu, protecting illegal aliens takes priority over defending her city against a federal lawsuit, compromising much-needed fed...

item.title: Over 3 Million People Sign Leniency Petition for Illegal Alien Charged with Killing Three Florida Motorists
item.description: Over 3 million people have signed a petition demanding leniency for Harjinder Singh, the illegal alien truck driver accused of causing a horrific cras...

item.title: The Trump Administration Plans to Crack Down on Immigration by Islamist Extremists
item.description: The Trump administration is considering a ban on members and affiliates of the Muslim Brotherhood and similar organizations and networks. This makes c...

item.title: Third Military Buffer Zone Established Along U.S.-Mexico Border in Arizona
item.description: The “Yuma National Defense Area” at the southern border in Arizona allows the military to support the Trump administration’s whole-of-government appro...

item.title: Mass Immigration Lobby Peddling Stale, Obsolete Arguments Few Are Buying
item.description: The pro-mass-migration lobby has been recycling the same time-worn talking points to fool the public into accepting open borders, amnesty, and the mas...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
